englishTranslationText:
Said	Ibrahim,	“What	is	your	task,	O	the	
sent	angels?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ibraheem	ne	farmāya	to	aey	Firishto!	Tum	
kis	kām	se	āaye

arabicText: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍۢ مُّجْرِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
They	said,	“We	have	been	sent	towards	a	
guilty	nation.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bole	hum	ek	mujrim	qaum	ki	taraf	bheje	
gaye	haiñ
